title: Holiday presents for Typophiles?
content:
Handcrafted Typophile Photo Albums on eBay

For the past several months, my wife (of Tami Jo Studios, [http://tamijo.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20091227021639/http:/tamijo.com/ "http://tamijo.com")) has been transforming the Typophile Film Fest 4 posters into some amazing lotus-fold photo albums. She’s just put them on to eBay, and is donating 10% of proceeds toward Typophile.

Original poster design can be seen here: [http://typophile.com/node/37243](http://web.archive.org/web/20091227021639/http:/typophile.com/node/37243 "http://typophile.com/node/37243")

The albums open out from a 4.5” square to allow photos, drawings, or other images to be tipped-in inside.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091227021639im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/!BdIMNlg!2k~$(KGrHqEH-D0EquEbDjSjBK3gtWWhUg~~_12_5454.JPG)

There’s only 7 of them. Get ’em while you can!

[Album One](http://web.archive.org/web/20091227021639/http:/cgi.ebay.com/Typophile-Film-Festival-4-Handcrafted-Photo-Album_W0QQitemZ170397057004QQcmdZViewItemQQptZLH_DefaultDomain_0?hash=item27ac74bfec) | [Album Two](http://web.archive.org/web/20091227021639/http:/cgi.ebay.com/Typophile-Film-Festival-4-Handcrafted-Photo-Album_W0QQitemZ170397055975QQcmdZViewItemQQptZLH_DefaultDomain_0?hash=item27ac74bbe7) | [Album Three](http://web.archive.org/web/20091227021639/http:/cgi.ebay.com/Typophile-Film-Festival-4-Handcrafted-Photo-Album_W0QQitemZ170397054535QQcmdZViewItemQQptZLH_DefaultDomain_0?hash=item27ac74b647) | [Album Four](http://web.archive.org/web/20091227021639/http:/cgi.ebay.com/Typophile-Film-Festival-4-Handcrafted-Photo-Album_W0QQitemZ170397052995QQcmdZViewItemQQptZLH_DefaultDomain_0?hash=item27ac74b043) | [Album Five](http://web.archive.org/web/20091227021639/http:/cgi.ebay.com/Typophile-Film-Festival-4-Handcrafted-Photo-Album_W0QQitemZ170397049673QQcmdZViewItemQQptZLH_DefaultDomain_0?hash=item27ac74a349) | [Album Six](http://web.archive.org/web/20091227021639/http:/cgi.ebay.com/Typophile-Film-Festival-4-Handcrafted-Photo-Album_W0QQitemZ170397047944QQcmdZViewItemQQptZLH_DefaultDomain_0?hash=item27ac749c88) | [Album Seven](http://web.archive.org/web/20091227021639/http:/cgi.ebay.com/Typophile-Film-Festival-4-Handcrafted-Photo-Album_W0QQitemZ170397050674QQcmdZViewItemQQptZLH_DefaultDomain_0?hash=item27ac74a732)

It’s never too early for gift shopping, right? Post your best typographic gift finds for the season in this thread.
author: Jared Benson

comments.content:
